dict.acceptation: 樱桃；樱桃树；樱桃色；处女膜；

sent.orig: Colors are: Sapele, cherry, rosewood, Thai pomelo, fight wood, iron and cherry wood and so on.
sent.trans: 颜色有：沙比利，樱桃木，花梨木，泰柚，拼木，铁桃木等等。

sent.orig: Spicy plum and sweet cherry aromas combining with a delicate violet note and cherry oak.
sent.trans: 酒香中散发出近似于李子、樱桃的芳香，又混合着迷人、雅致的紫罗兰和橡木的味道。

sent.orig: We're in Cherry Garcia with a maraschino cherry.
sent.trans: 我们所处的市场更像是加上黑樱桃的樱桃巧克力冰淇淋。

sent.orig: A New Sour Cherry Variety for Processing Use'Jilin Red Cherry 1'
sent.trans: 加工用樱桃新品种‘吉林红樱桃1号’

sent.orig: Cleanse with Japanese Cherry Blossom Bath &Shower Gel and finish with Japanese Cherry Blossom EDT.
sent.trans: 以日本樱花沐浴露洁净肌肤，然后再喷上日本樱花淡香水。
